name: Extreme Racing Zombie Attack
description:
Extreme Racing Zobie Attack is here! In addition to the rich gameplay you've come to expect, we decided to go with 3D graphics.All new game design that will push your mobile device to it's limit, we hope you will have a completely new zombie shooting experience.

THE MOST EXCITING ZOMBIE RACING SHOOTER EVER
- Use every weapon in your arsenal - assault rifles, shotguns, pistols, sniper rifles - to kill every last zombie.

EXPLORE A VAST WORLD
- In this zombie era, protect yourself, look for clues about the outbreak, search for a cure, discover the truth behind the virus.

Endless Run

HONE YOUR SKILL
- Learn to aim for the head, prioritize your targets, the only way to survive is to adapt.
- Wide array of zombies

CHALLENGE YOURSELF
- Challenging twist and turns
- Earn Money buy new cars and guns

LIVE OR DIE


Gamebread "live to play
